ygData.subject: Re: The Call to Asheron?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know a lot about it, seen screen shots of it.  It doesn t look as good as EQ but from what I ve heard they are working on the graphics to make it look
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know a lot about it, seen screen shots of it. It doesn't look as
good as EQ but from what I've heard they are working on the graphics to make
it look even better. Also they said for Phase 2 they made the world bigger
and worked on the spells, I've heard in Phase 1 the spells sucked, that EQ's
was a 1,000 times better but ppl keep forgetting AC is still in VERY early
testing. One thing I think that might kinda stink about AC is the fact you
can only be human, but you can edit your face and clothes while creating
your character. I think if they listen to the players AC is gonna be a
killer, if they don't then it may fail and EQ will reign king.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
**************************
